item.title: What's on My Desk - 04/2024
item.description: I’ve arguably spent way too much time tweaking and futzing my home office setup. Here’s where I’m at. Desk 30” x 60” Javis Powdercoated Standing Desk in black by Fully. I don’t think they make this particular model anymore but it’s perfect for me, especially after adding big, rubbery wheels for rolling on and not destroying our hardwood floors. Chair A classic Herman Miller Aeron Chair which I’ve had for nearly 20 years.
